title: Help, Game keeps bug splatting
body: My game will freeze, then freeze again, then freeze again, then will freeze completely and then it will either bug splat or i will have to turn my computer off. I do not know what to do. Please help me i want to play in a game, i've gotten penalties because of this.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing some nasty system driver or hardware issues, since you're seeing freezing and Bugsplats. I'd like you to work through the most common solutions for this, which can be found in our [**Bugsplat Guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

If you still encounter issues after taking those steps, let me know. ^.^
